title: MD
biography: Tumkur Ramaiah Satishchandran was a Padma Bhushan–winning 1953 batch Indian Administrative Service officer of Karnataka cadre, who served as the Governor of Goa and also served as the 7th Principal Secretary to the Prime Minister of India, the Chief Secretary of Karnataka and Power Secretary of India.
aiSummary: Satish Rudrappa is a epilepsy management specialist with an H-index of 9 at Neurology (Member). Has been published in In vitro cellular & developmental biology. Animal, Animal bioscience. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
